## CompDivNode class

Component-wise division

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class CompDivNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a / b for each component. Both inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4). Division by zero produces undefined results.
